name: Grim Deeper
description:
In the lands between dimensions, lives a being who captures souls and returns them to the underworld.

Grim Deeper is a hack and slash, with roguelike elements. Explore through the landscape, fight enemies to collect their soul, and buy upgrades with those souls to further your progression. Can you make it to the teleporter without losing your own soul?

This game was created during Ludem Dare 44, a 72 Hour Game Jam. As such, it may contain bugs, and can be completed in 10-15mins.

Patch Notes

v1.1 (May 1, 2019)

  • Fixed spawners showing  "null" timers.
  • Fixed purchase indicator still showing on doors after they have been opened.

v1.2 (May 2, 2019)

  • Fixed bug where the player can still be killed after they have completed the level.
